trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que irá processar a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting"> </xref>, ou <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting"> </xref> eventos do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control allows you to manipulate the parameters that are used to determine the method that is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>eventos do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controlo permite-lhe manipular os parâmetros que são utilizados para determinar o método que é chamado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: When you create an ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um delegado ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler, identifique o método que irá processar o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o processador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os delegados do processador de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
